name: Celestial Annihilation
desc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, their action Advances Forward by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack by 50%.
enhanced_desc: When a character Breaks an enemy's Weakness, their action Advances Forward by 100% and increases the DMG dealt by their next attack by 75%. If the Weakness Broken enemy is an Elite Enemy, then Action Advances for all allies.
